languages.text: {n}Монтэг гордо задирает подбородок.{/n} "Тогда разрешите присоединиться к семье".
{n}Einrich raises his chin proudly.{/n} "In that case, I request permission to join my family."
languages.original_text: {n}Монтэг гордо задирает подбородок.{/n} "Тогда разрешите присоединиться к семье".

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich raises his chin proudly.{/n} "Then I ask to be granted permission to join my family."
traits.speaker: InfernusMaster

languages.text: {n}Einrich lève fièrement le menton.{/n} « Dans ce cas, je demande la permission de rejoindre ma famille. »
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich raises his chin proudly.{/n} "In that case, I request permission to join my family."

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich lève fièrement le menton.{/n} « Dans ce cas, je demande la permission de rejoindre ma famille. »
traits.speaker: InfernusMaster

languages.text: {n}Einrich levanta orgulloso la barbilla.{/n} «En ese caso, solicito permiso para estar con mi familia».
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich raises his chin proudly.{/n} "In that case, I request permission to join my family."

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich levanta orgulloso la barbilla.{/n} «En ese caso, solicito permiso para estar con mi familia».
traits.speaker: InfernusMaster

languages.text: {n}艾因里奇骄傲地扬起下巴。{/n}“既然如此，我请求您允许我呆在我的家人身边。”
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich raises his chin proudly.{/n} "In that case, I request permission to join my family."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾因里奇骄傲地扬起下巴。{/n}“既然如此，我请求您允许我呆在我的家人身边。”
traits.speaker: InfernusMaster

languages.text: {n}アインリッヒは誇り高く顎を上げた。{/n}「ならば、私の家族に加わる許可を与えよう」
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich raises his chin proudly.{/n} "In that case, I request permission to join my family."

traits.locale_text: {n}アインリッヒは誇り高く顎を上げた。{/n}「ならば、私の家族に加わる許可を与えよう」
traits.speaker: InfernusMaster

languages.text: {n}Einrich reckt stolz das Kinn.{/n} "Wenn dem so ist, bitte ich um Erlaubnis, mich meiner Familie anzuschließen."
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich raises his chin proudly.{/n} "In that case, I request permission to join my family."

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich reckt stolz das Kinn.{/n} "Wenn dem so ist, bitte ich um Erlaubnis, mich meiner Familie anzuschließen."
traits.speaker: InfernusMaster

languages.text: {n}Einrich, gururla çenesini kaldırıyor.{/n} "O hâlde ailemin yanına gitmek için izin istiyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich raises his chin proudly.{/n} "In that case, I request permission to join my family."
